description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-44574)- Support expanding text from right to left when exporting file to html 
(CELLSNET-44561)- Ability to set Default Font while rendering spreadsheet to HTML 
(CELLSNET-44562)- Ability to set Default Font while rendering spreadsheet to images 
(CELLSNET-44515)- Add/Remove context menu items in Aspose.Cells.GridWeb 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-44565)- CellsHelper.GetVersion() needed for GridWeb 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-44552)- Refreshing Pivot Table throws exception 
(CELLSNET-44542)- Excel file is not properly rendering into HTML 
(CELLSNET-44541)- Contents overlap while converting spreadsheet to HTML 
(CELLSNET-44520)- Pivot Field's dropdown is missing after re-saving XLSX as XLSB 
(CELLSNET-44518)- Spreadsheet becomes corrupted after re-saving XLSX as XLSB 
(CELLSNET-44501)- Refreshing and Calculating Data on existing Pivot Table generates corrupt excel file 
(CELLSNET-44447)- Chart.ToImage is generating incorrect image 
(CELLSNET-43656)- Some text items are slightly truncated in the output HTML 
(CELLSNET-44590)- Problem exporting Excel to PDF with special characters in the header and footer 
(CELLSNET-44517)- Vertical alignment wrong when generating range to image using SheetRender.ToImage 
(CELLSNET-44589)- Aspose.Cells generated EMF shows incorrect axis labels when inserted in Word document and converted to PDF 
(CELLSNET-44586)- Less than single spacing doesn't export to PDF properly 
(CELLSNET-44564)- Chart's EMF generated under Session 0 does not display all contents 
(CELLSNET-44559)- Chart.HasAxis is showing wrong value 
(CELLSNET-44538)- Empty PNG 0KB file generated while converting XLSX to HTML 
(CELLSNET-44591)- Cells.ClearContents removes the formula for the cells below the specified range 
(CELLSNET-44577)- Issue with Worksheet.Copy() - All comments after IV column are missing in the copied sheet 
(CELLSNET-44573)- Pictures in worksheets copied from an external xlsx are not sized the same as originals 
(CELLSNET-44571)- Copying workbook into new workbook produced unreadable content error 
(CELLSNET-44568)- TextBox in the chart is lost while copying Workbooks 
(CELLSNET-44567)- Chart colors are lost while copying workbook 
(CELLSNET-44545)- Formula results in #NAME error after copying the rows and calculating formulas 
(CELLSNET-44544)- Formula is replaced by 0 after copying the rows and calculating formulas 
(CELLSNET-44543)- The fill format of shape is lost when converting the file to html 
(CELLSNET-41153)- Printing zone is moved a bit using latest versions of the product 
(CELLSNET-44599)- Showing total for list object with only 1 record corrupts the workbook
(CELLSNET-44598)- Incorrect ListObject size after ShowTotals set to false
(CELLSNET-44583)- GridWeb control height grows on scroll down post back 
(CELLSNET-44580)- Scrollbar moves down on IE11 and sometimes GridWeb looses grid formatting 
(CELLSNET-44550)- Paging is not working after specifying the Session storage path - Aspose.Cells.GridWeb 
(CELLSNET-44547)- Gridweb changes layout when page index is changed 
(CELLSNET-44539)- Gridweb is not refreshing after scrolling or page change because of registering Telerik RadAjaxManager control 
(CELLSNET-44537)- Layout problem of Dropdown in GridWeb 
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-44563)- Exception: "Input string was not in a correct format." when loading an HTML file format 
(CELLSNET-44560)- Problem with saving a workbook 
(CELLSNET-44558)- ArgumentNullException at WorksheetCollection.GetNamedRanges method 
(CELLSNET-44588)- ArgumentOutOfRangeException while calling AutoFitColumns() on a worksheet 
(CELLSNET-44556)- Exception occurred when saving an excel document 
(CELLSNET-44554)- CellsException: error in Cell: C2-Length cannot be less than zero, at Workbook ctor 
(CELLSNET-44546)- Exception: "Invalid password" while opening an encrypted Excel XLS file by Aspose.Cells APIs
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
